name: content_migration_completed
definition: The event is emitted anytime a content migration request is completed.
trigger: Triggered anytime a content migration request is completed.

schema.content_migration_id: The Canvas id of the content migration.
schema.context_id: The Canvas id of the context associated with the content migration.
schema.context_type: The type of context associated with the content migration.
schema.context_uuid: The uuid of the context associated with the content migration.
schema.import_quizzes_next: Indicates whether the user requested that the quizzes in the content migration be created in Quizzes.Next (true) or in native Canvas (false).
schema.lti_context_id: The lti context id of the context associated with the content migration.
